ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: It is a class about Vico and his context within Italy and Europe of the period. It is a class that I would recommend to anyone interested generally and perhaps with a background in either poetics, politics, philosophy, history or philology. Students without any background in these fields pre-18th century might not fully appreciate the course.
I would recommend the course to a broad range of students; I'm constantly finding the material applicable to various areas of scholarship.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: The course gave me crucial exposure to Vico that will shape my reading of countless other authors and debates.
